main event: A civilian observed a bright, silver, saucer-shaped object moving rapidly in the sky near Beavercreek, Ohio on December 28, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes,The object was stationary for most of the observation time,The observer estimated the object's speed at about 750 mph,The object emitted a pulsating reddish-orange light, and the observer has reported seeing similar objects on two other occasions in the area.
sighted object: a bright, silver, saucer-shaped object with a pulsating reddish-orange light
witness description: a 25-year-old male electronic engineer who has observed many aircraft, including high-performance military jets
